Oh ojay, thanks. And that'd be really tight if it works out. And why meh?
Check out padmapper.com and just a two room one prlly with only us. But idk, nothing official yet ya know. Keeping options open. And meh okie

Yeah, well we were together for a long time ya know so def understandable love. I miss you and love you Sara

What're you up to?

Was trying to print stuff but didn't work. Need to do it later. Eliotts gotta go. Tough havig all yer bags?

Like it'll come to you in time, soon. Not everything is supposed to be figured to quickly ya know. Like sleep on it and your mind will help make decisions thru days along with exterior forces helping you make decisions thru time
Yes yes, you're smart (: I'll figure it out and it'll all be fine. I'll be with you and well be happy! Ps if I have nowhere to live this summer, you can have my bed and such for your apartment :P
Damn, okay if you say so. Thinking I might scrounge cheap furniture from thrift stores and such. Worth u hauling up? Idk? And I love you dear :) you'll figure this out
Yeah definitely. And idk, but if I have nowhere to put it, we should use it. I live you too babe, well be fine

Love you

Im asking you to control me, I'm asking you what you want. It's a balance Sara. Lastnight I had my choice and now you. Why're you doing this?
